author: Sarah O'Brien
title: Medicare beneficiaries who get coronavirus may face a price shock
description: Although Congress has eliminated all costs for coronavirus testing and improved access to care, it's the price of treatment that could become the bigger concern.
content:
These may be extra scary times for Medicare beneficiaries.
For the 62 million people enrolled most of whom are age 65 or older, or younger with disabilities the coronavirus generally poses a greater health risk. And while Congress and regulators have elimina… [+4768 chars]
